name: Planet X2.1
overview: Planet X2.1 is an enhanced version of David "8-Bit Guy" Murray's 2017 C64 Real-Time Strategy/Role-Playing game Planet X2. The game has some graphical enhancements over the original game. Basically a "remastered" version of the original game. Also Unlike the original version, this version is available as a digital download, and also on cartridge. This version was released on October 25, 2020. The game is compatible on both PAL and NTSC C64s.
